ocd: OCD preference, this can either be sorting `alphabetical` or based on the `length` of the items.
registry: Default npm registry we should use for looking up package information.
github-clone: git URL template for when you clone GitHub repositories.
token: Personal GitHub access/authorization token which is used to communicate with the API.
cols: Maximum length of the console output.
algorithm: Cipher algorithm that is used en/decode passwords in your config.
